title: Direct X error when joining a game after champion selection.
body:
When i try to join a game i get this error saying 

An unknown DirectX roor has occurred and League of Legends cannot start.
Please make sure your video card is using the latest video drivers from the 
manufacturer.

im using a NVIDIA GeFore 6600 GT 
ive tried to update it but i cant find a update but i cant find any

replies.body:
>An unknown DirectX roor

The hidden roor is the deadliest.

[You 100% sure on not being able to find the update?](http://www.geforce.com/drivers) Does it say you already have the latest version? If it's not installing because of that, then you can try reinstalling the driver. Be sure to restart your computer after the initial uninstall, because the services of the previous driver will still be in your RAM.

Best of luck.
I'm having the same problem also my graphics card is fully updated

Do you also have the same graphics card?

One possible solution could be to reinstall League of Legends, because by default it will install the required DirectX version for you. Reinstalling is the easiest path but also the longest. You can manually install DirectX 9 but it's a bit more complicated.

One last thing, are you on Mac or PC?
